member.name: T:SFGraphics.Cameras.Camera
member.summary: A container for 4x4 matrices. The matrices can not be set directly.

member.name: P:SFGraphics.Cameras.Camera.DefaultPosition
member.summary: The camera's initial position or position after . Defaults to (0, 10, -80).

member.name: P:SFGraphics.Cameras.Camera.Position
member.summary: The position of the camera in scene units.

member.name: P:SFGraphics.Cameras.Camera.Scale
member.summary: The scale for all objects. Defaults to 1.

member.name: P:SFGraphics.Cameras.Camera.FovRadians
member.summary:
The vertical field of view in radians. Updates and all matrices when set.
Values less than or equal to 0 or greater than or equal to PI are ignored.

member.name: P:SFGraphics.Cameras.Camera.FovDegrees
member.summary:
The vertical field of view in degrees. Updates and all matrices when set.
Values less than or equal to 0 or greater than or equal to 180 are ignored.

member.name: P:SFGraphics.Cameras.Camera.RotationXRadians
member.summary: The rotation around the x-axis in radians.

member.name: P:SFGraphics.Cameras.Camera.RotationXDegrees
member.summary: The rotation around the x-axis in degrees.

member.name: P:SFGraphics.Cameras.Camera.RotationYRadians
member.summary: The rotation around the y-axis in radians.

member.name: P:SFGraphics.Cameras.Camera.RotationYDegrees
member.summary: The rotation around the y-axis in degrees.

member.summary: The far clip plane of the perspective matrix.

member.name: P:SFGraphics.Cameras.Camera.NearClipPlane
member.summary: The near clip plane of the perspective matrix.

member.name: P:SFGraphics.Cameras.Camera.RenderWidth
member.summary: The width of the viewport or rendered region in pixels. Values less than 1 are set to 1.

member.name: P:SFGraphics.Cameras.Camera.RenderHeight
member.summary: The height of the viewport or rendered region in pixels. Values less than 1 are set to 1.

The offset where data replacement will begin
member.exception: The specified range includes data outside the buffer's current capacity.

Reads the buffer's data into structs of type .

member.returns: An IntPtr for the buffer's data

member.name: M:SFGraphics.GLObjects.BufferObjects.BufferObject.Unmap
member.summary: Releases the mapping of the buffer's data store. If false, the buffer's data was corrupted while mapped and should be reinitialized.

member.summary: Generates a framebuffer with a color attachment of the specified pixel format and dimensions. A render buffer of the same dimensions as the color attachment is generated for the depth component. Binds the framebuffer.
member.param: The target to which is bound
The width of attached textures or renderbuffers
The height of attached textures or renderbuffers
The internal format for all color attachments
The number of color attachments to create. Ex: 1 would only create ColorAttachment0.

member.name: T:SFGraphics.GLObjects.GLObjectManagement.GLObjectManager
member.summary:
and all subclasses use reference counting to determine what OpenGL objects can be safely deleted.
Call with a valid OpenGL context current to delete objects with no references.
The reference count may not be decremented until after the context is destroyed. Call prior to if more immediate cleanup is desired.

member.name: M:SFGraphics.GLObjects.GLObjectManagement.GLObjectManager.DeleteUnusedGLObjects
member.summary: The appropriate GL.Delete() function is called for all instances with no references.

member.name: T:SFGraphics.GLObjects.GLObjectManagement.ReferenceCounting
member.summary: Provides helpers for maintaining object reference counts. allows references to be incremented and decremented from separate threads.

member.summary: Increments the reference for or initializes to 1 if not found.

member.name: M:SFGraphics.GLObjects.GLObjectManagement.ReferenceCounting.DecrementReference``1(System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentDictionary{``0,System.Int32},``0)
member.summary: Decrements the reference count for if the reference count is greater than zero.

member.name: M:SFGraphics.GLObjects.GLObjectManagement.ReferenceCounting.GetObjectsWithNoReferences``1(System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentDictionary{``0,System.Int32})
member.summary: Finds objects with zero references that can have their unmanaged data safely deleted.
member.returns: A hashset of objects with zero references

member.summary: Gets the compiled program binary for the program . This method should be called after the shaders are loaded and the program is linked. Hardware or software changes may cause compatibility issues with the program binary.

member.name: M:SFGraphics.GLObjects.Shaders.Shader.LoadProgramBinary(System.Byte[],OpenTK.Graphics.OpenGL.BinaryFormat)
member.summary:
Loads the entire program from the compiled binary and format generated by . The value returned by is updated.
Hardware or software changes may cause compatibility issues with the program binary. If program creation fails with precompiled binaries, resort to compiling the shaders from source.
member.param: The format of the compiled binary
The compiled program binary

member.summary: Creates an empty depth texture of the specified dimensions and format. This texture does not use mipmaps. The border color is set to white, so attempts to sample outside the texture's border will return white.

The internal format of the image data. This should be a valid depth format.

member.name: T:SFGraphics.GlUtils.OpenGLExtensions
member.summary: This class contains methods for checking the availability of OpenGL extensions. Extensions that aren't core for the current OpenGL version may not be available on all graphics processors. For example, an application can target OpenGL 3.30 but still use newer features if available.

member.name: M:SFGraphics.GlUtils.OpenGLExtensions.IsAvailable(System.String)
member.summary: Returns true if an extension is available. There is no need to check core extensions for the current OpenGL version. Initializes the list of current extensions again if empty.
member.param: The name of the OpenGL extension. Ex: GL_KHR_debug. Names are not case sensitive.
member.returns: True if the extension is available

member.name: M:SFGraphics.GlUtils.OpenGLExtensions.InitializeCurrentExtensions
member.summary: Clears and initializes the available extensions for searching with .
